name: Aruvi
bio: The channel has show where people express their problems and the show helps to slove the problems. The protagonist, a young girl Aruvi also goes there and shares the fact that she was raped by 3 people. The show call the culprits and the producer also see her and makes a plan to bed her. The twists and turns begin in show . She targets one of them with gun and asks him to tell a story which will make her cry. The person seems rough and hard. He says he doesn't know. The she asks when he had cried last . He replies a month back. Then he goes on to narrate why did he cry.
